member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatObj.Load(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads a scene into a FileLoadResult object from a Wavefromt *.obj file. All warning and error messages are in the returned object's 'Messages' collection. The actual scene data is in the returned object's 'Model' data.
member.param: if set to true texture images will be loaded and set in the property.
member.returns: A containing the file load result.

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatObj.ReadScene(System.IO.StreamReader,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Internally used to reads the scene.
member.param: if set to true [load texture images].

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatObj.MapIndex(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Maps an index defined in the file. Indexes are 1 based, so we fix this. Also, if they're negative they're 1 based but going backwards from the last element - which is why we need the .

member.name: F:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatObj.dataSeparators
member.summary: The data separators, any valid value that can separate data in a line.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatMtl
member.summary: A file loader for the Wavefront *.mtl file format.

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatMtl.Load(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads materials from the specified stream.
member.param: if set to true texture images will be loaded and set in the property.
member.returns: The results of the file load.

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.FileFormatMtl.Read(System.IO.TextReader,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Read the material data from the specified stream.
member.param: The path. This can be null - it is only used for recording diagnostic information.
if set to true [load texture images].
member.returns: The results of the file load.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.FileLoadResult`1
member.summary: Represents the results of a file loading operation.

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.FileLoadResult`1.#ctor(`0,System.Collections.Generic.List{FileFormatWavefront.Message})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.Internals.LineData
member.summary: This helper class aids us in dealing with Wavefront line data.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Group.Names
member.summary: Gets the group names. A group doesn't necessarily have to have any names. Groups can also share names (i.e one group can be part of another).

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Material.TextureMapSpecularHighlight
member.summary: Gets the specular highlight texture map.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Material.IlluminationModel
member.summary: Gets the illumination model. See the specification at http://paulbourke.net/dataformats/mtl/ for details on this value.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Material.OpticalDensity
member.summary: Gets the optical density, also known as the Index of Refraction.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Material.BumpStrength
member.summary: Gets the occasionally used bump strength.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Scene
member.summary: Represent a scene of data loaded from an *.obj file.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Scene.UngroupedFaces
member.summary: Gets the faces which don't belong to any groups.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.Scene.ObjectName
member.summary: Gets the name of the object in the file. This can be (and in many cases will be) null.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.Message
member.summary: Represents a message of a specific severity relating to the loading of data from a file.

member.name: F:FileFormatWavefront.Message.fileName
member.summary: The file name. May be null.

member.name: F:FileFormatWavefront.Message.lineNumber
member.summary: The line number. May be null.

member.name: F:FileFormatWavefront.Message.exception
member.summary: The exception associated with the message, may be null.

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.Message.#ctor(FileFormatWavefront.MessageType,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Message.MessageType
member.summary: Gets the type of the message.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Message.FileName
member.summary: Gets the name of the file.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.MessageType
member.summary: Represents a message type for a loading message.

member.name: F:FileFormatWavefront.MessageType.Warning
member.summary: A warning message - indicates something may be wrong with the data.

member.name: F:FileFormatWavefront.MessageType.Error
member.summary: An error message - indicates that we KNOW something is wrong with the data.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.TextureMap.Path
member.summary: Gets the path to the texture file.

member.name: P:FileFormatWavefront.Model.TextureMap.Image
member.summary: Gets the texture image. Note that this is only set if the file is loaded with the 'loadTextureImages' option set to true.

member.name: T:FileFormatWavefront.Extensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: String extensions used internally just make make the comparison with a string and a line type a little cleaner.

member.name: M:FileFormatWavefront.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsLineType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether this string matches the specified line type.
member.returns: True if the string matches the linetype.
